description: Assets migration: images, SVG decoratives, and shapes. CAN RUN IN PARALLEL with PRD-03 and PRD-04.

userStories.title: Copy brand images to src/images/brands/
userStories.description: As a developer, I want brand/partner logos so that the logo cloud and testimonials can display them.
acceptanceCriteria: All brand SVG/PNG files from buio are copied

userStories.title: Copy logo images to src/images/logos/
userStories.description: As a developer, I want logo assets so that the Logo component works.
acceptanceCriteria: NextNode logo SVG is present (light and dark variants)
Logo is properly sized for header use
userStories.notes: Use existing NextNode logo or create placeholder. Do NOT use buio logo.

userStories.title: Copy team placeholder images to src/images/team/
userStories.description: As a developer, I want team member placeholder images so that team pages display properly.
userStories.notes: Use placeholder images from buio or generate simple avatars

userStories.title: Copy avatar images to src/images/avatar/
userStories.description: As a developer, I want avatar images so that testimonials can display author photos.

userStories.title: Copy changelog images to src/images/changelog/
userStories.description: As a developer, I want changelog images so that changelog entries can have visuals.
acceptanceCriteria: At least 3 placeholder images for changelog entries
userStories.notes: Copy from buio/src/images/changelog/ or create placeholders

userStories.title: Copy decorative assets to src/images/assets/
userStories.description: As a developer, I want decorative assets so that sections have visual embellishments.
acceptanceCriteria: All decorative images from buio are copied
Images are optimized (SVG preferred for vectors)

userStories.title: Import all SVG decorative shape components
userStories.description: As a developer, I want SVG shape components so that sections can have decorative elements.
acceptanceCriteria: All decorative SVG components from buio are imported
SVGs use NextNode color tokens where applicable
Test file exists covering shape rendering
userStories.notes: Copy from buio/src/components/assets/ - look for blob, gradient, pattern components

userStories.title: Create PR to main for assets phase
userStories.description: As a developer, I want a PR created so that the assets can be reviewed and merged.
acceptanceCriteria: All previous stories in this PRD pass
PR is created with gh pr create
PR title follows convention: feat(buio): assets and images
PR description lists all asset categories added
userStories.notes: Use gh pr create --title 'feat(buio): assets and images' --body '...'
